short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Snapshot youtube and find out who the celebrity is.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Implement AI to your web browser. 
Take screenshot from video and find out celebrity names.

1. When watching Youtube, tab the extension and it will take a screenshot of  the clip.
2. Hit 'Predict' and image will parsed to Clarifai. And return celebrity name. 
3. Click celebrity name to learn more (from YouTube). 

https://github.com/nicoodakp/snap-and-clarifai
(Please go to clarifai.com to register for your API key.)

8/6/2019    UPDATES: Some minor changes
2/23/2020  Just realized API changed from Clarifai...it leads to app not properly functioning in the past few weeks....I pushed an update and now it should be working.
